productDescLong: Conveniently carry everything you need to and from work thanks to the Norman crossbody messenger bag from Aldo!

productName: Single Gusset Flapover Colombian Leather Messenger Bag
productDescShort: Rich, full grain cowhide leather exterior single gusset. Flapover construction with fully lined interior. Front gusset pockets have organizer features including a cell phone pocket . Roomy, main compartment features a full length zipper pocket. Rear exterior open pocket for easy access to frequently needed items. Adjustable and padded shoulder strap.

productName: Aldo Saltillo Messenger Bag Cognac Men
productDescShort: Faux leather,Foldover snap closure,Top handle with 3 inch drop,Shoulder strap, adjust up to 21 inch drop,Front and back zip pockets,Snap pocket under flap,Fabric lining: tech friendly padded slot with hook and loop closure, interior zip pocket, 4 slip pockets,Dimensions:14 inch x 4½ inch x 11½ inch,Imported.
productDescLong: Faux leather,Foldover snap closure,Top handle with 3 inch drop,Shoulder strap, adjust up to 21 inch drop,Front and back zip pockets,Snap pocket under flap,Fabric lining: tech friendly padded slot with hook and loop closure, interior zip pocket, 4 slip pockets,Dimensions:14 inch x 4½ inch x 11½ inch,Imported.

productDescShort: Bring a tailored accent to your professional attire with the Ankenbauer messenger bag from Aldo. A spacious interior and plenty of pockets will make this bag ideal for your daily commute.

productDescShort: Carry your laptop or tablet with room to spare in the Aldo Unelan Buckle Messenger bag! This durable, sleek bag features a  padded tablet compartment with closure security and is the perfect bag for work or commuting!

productDescShort: The Port-On Me messenger bag from Kenneth Cole Reaction will be your new favorite travel companion. This bag features a padded laptop sleeve, external USB port to charge devices, and TECHNI-COLE™ technology to prevent RFID identity scan theft!
